title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 1 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 1 2021
description:
Big day at the Supreme Court. Buck declares, "I think this is a moment where you gotta ask yourself, if we don't conserve life, what are we conserving?" Jeff Zucker suspends Cuomo, clings to fiction that CNN does journalism. Fox News Chief Legal Correspondent Shannon Bream reports from courthouse on the abortion ruling. As the first case of Omicron is discovered in the U.S. the culture of distain for the unvaccinated will soon extend to the unboostered.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
